statements: SELECT * FROM vulnerability_tracking;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level, patched FROM vulnerability_tracking;
SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name, affected_system FROM vulnerability_tracking WHERE severity_level = 'High';
SELECT vulnerability_name, patch_description FROM vulnerability_tracking WHERE patched = FALSE;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_tracking ORDER BY severity_level DESC, vulnerability_id ASC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerability_tracking WHERE patched = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_tracking WHERE severity_level = 'High' ORDER BY vulnerability_id DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, affected_system FROM vulnerability_tracking WHERE patched = FALSE AND severity_level IN ('High', 'Critical');
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level, IF(patched, 'Patched', 'Not Patched') AS status FROM vulnerability_tracking WHERE severity_level = 'Critical';
SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name, severity_level, patch_description FROM vulnerability_tracking WHERE severity_level = 'Medium' AND affected_system LIKE '%Windows%';
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name, severity FROM vulnerabilities ORDER BY severity ASC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM vulnerabilities GROUP BY vulnerability_name;
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities WHERE affected_systems > 100;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity, affected_systems FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT vulnerability_name, affected_systems, severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE affected_systems > 100;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity, description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'Low' ORDER BY vulnerability_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM patches WHERE patch_date > '2022-01-01' AND patch_date < '2022-06-30';
SELECT p.patch_name, v.vulnerability_name, v.severity FROM patches p INNER JOIN vulnerabilities v ON p.patched_vulnerability_id = v.vulnerability_id ORDER BY v.severity ASC, p.patch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities;
SELECT name, description, severity FROM vulnerabilities ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_id, name, description, severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity='High';
SELECT patch_version, applied FROM patches WHERE applied=true;
SELECT vulnerability_id, patch_id, tracking_status FROM vulnerability_tracking WHERE tracking_status='Open' ORDER BY last_updated_at ASC;
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities;
SELECT vulnerability_id, name, severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity='High';
SELECT vulnerability_id, name, description FROM vulnerabilities ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT v.name, v.severity, p.patch_description FROM vulnerabilities v JOIN patches p ON v.vulnerability_id = p.vulnerability_id;

SELECT vt.tracking_id, v.name AS vulnerability_name, p.patch_description AS patch_description, vt.tracking_status FROM vulnerability_tracking vt JOIN vulnerabilities v ON vt.vulnerability_id = v.vulnerability_id JOIN patches p ON vt.patch_id = p.patch_id WHERE vt.tracking_status='Resolved';
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities;
SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerabilities;
SELECT description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity_level = 'High';
SELECT * FROM patches ORDER BY patch_timestamp DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, patch_id, patch_timestamp FROM vulnerabilities INNER JOIN patches ON vulnerabilities.vulnerability_id = patches.vulnerability_id;
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities ORDER BY vulnerability_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity_level = 'High';
SELECT vulnerability_name, description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE vulnerability_id = 3;
SELECT patches.patch_name, vulnerability_name, patch_timestamp FROM patches JOIN vulnerabilities ON patches.vulnerability_id = vulnerabilities.vulnerability_id;
SELECT vulnerability_name, COUNT(*) AS patch_count FROM vulnerabilities LEFT JOIN patches ON vulnerabilities.vulnerability_id = patches.vulnerability_id GROUP BY vulnerability_name;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity FROM vulnerabilities
SELECT * FROM patches WHERE patch_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT description, patch_date FROM patches WHERE patch_id = 3
SELECT category_name FROM vulnerability_categories ORDER BY category_id DESC
SELECT version_name, release_date FROM software_versions WHERE release_date < NOW()
SELECT vulnerability_name, description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'high';
SELECT patch_name, description, patch_date FROM patches WHERE affected_vulnerability_id = 3 ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT category_name FROM vulnerability_categories WHERE category_id BETWEEN 1 AND 3;
SELECT version_name, release_date FROM software_versions WHERE version_name LIKE 'v%' ORDER BY release_date;
SELECT patch_name, applied_date, applied_by_user FROM patch_history WHERE applied_by_user IN ('admin', 'developer') ORDER BY applied_date DESC;
